name: Dreadful Carnage

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 15, Power Attack, Furious Focus, base attack bonus +11.

sections.body: Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer hit points, you can make an Intimidate check to demoralize all enemies within 30 feet as a free action. Enemies that cannot see both you and the enemy you reduced to 0 or fewer hit points are unaffected.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Slaying an enemy demoralizes your other nearby foes.
